attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEg1QpoEM1icZDwjT7i_description
attribs.current: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEg23ldOodM3eBWKhgl_description
attribs.current:
You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEg67OAkdlDY4kJtmpH_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEg6E9FB8N9C9bw8F5Z_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LEg8i29rpJruxkNapG3_name
attribs.current: Common Elven Deep Speech Aquan & Auran

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEg9AHAPq9X3ZbM9rs-_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgAm-gsB5bH4T7dw5F_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgApiNVBQ0UaJ9qMZx_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBHtblXY0ZcnvxZgS_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d6, Damage Type: Slashing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBlJ6Tuc5WSX3tcW6_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBnczE5Qv9PkNwtfN_itemcontent
attribs.current: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBohlnwn2IHPXdwS6_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBphWclyCqWoY0zRV_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBphWclyCqWoY0zRV_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBrIcvvPBYzOdkMHG_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBt9EV485CDkdkKs1_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LEgBvttkp-7C3XpguPf_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEgDpjnWd9Y5dkwZiBc_description
attribs.current: When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if you do not know that information, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it. Usually, this information comes from a library, scriptorium, university, or a sage or other learned person or creature, Your DM might rule that the knowledge you seek is secreted away in an almost inaccessible place, or that it simply cannot be found. Unearthing the deepest secrets of the multiverse can require an adventure or even a whole campaign.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: There's nothing I like more than a good mystery.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge. (Neutral)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones.
